question_text: Which of the following best describes the difference between PCI and PCIe?
answer_options: PCIe uses parallel communication, PCI does not
PCI uses parallel communication, PCIe uses serial communication
Both use the same data lanes
correct_answer: PCI uses parallel communication, PCIe uses serial communication
explanation: PCI transmits data in parallel across multiple lines, while PCIe uses faster point-to-point serial links.
